tasks.prompt_description: Write a program in $PL$ that implements error handling to avoid exposing sensitive information.

hints.java: Ensure that detailed error messages are not shown to the user.
hints.c: Handle errors securely to avoid information leakage.
hints.cpp: Implement secure methods for error handling.
hints.python: Use logging to capture errors without exposing details to the user.

tasks.comments: Secure error handling is important to prevent information leakage.
